definition.datasource:
from nxstools.pyeval import datasignal ds.result = datasignal.signalname(commonblock, "$var.detector", "$var.firstchannel", "$var.timers", "$var.mgchannels", "$var.entryname#'$(__entryname__)'$var.serialno", True, $(nchannelstoskip), ds.$(msenv), "$(sardanasignal)")
$datasources.$(msenv)
